title: India plans to produce 500 GW power from non-fossil sources by 2030
description: The Union New and Renewable Energy Minister Pralhad Joshi announced that over 200 GW of renewable energy is currently being produced, with plans for an additional 430 GW in various stages of development. The government aims to achieve 500 GW from non-fossil sources by 2030, backed by significant investment and policy support.
